verses.content: Ephraim tlâng rama Ramathaim- zophim khuoa chun mi pakhat a um a, a hming chu Elkana a nih; ama chu Jeroham naupa a na, ama chu Elihu naupa a na, ama chu Tohu naupa a na, ama chu Ephraim mi Zuph naupa a nih.
Nuhmei pahni a nei a, pakhat hming chu Hanna a na, a dang hming chu Peninna a nih; chun, Peninna chun nauhai a nei a, Hanna ruok chun nau a nei ve nawh a.
Chun, ama chu an khuoa in- thawkin Silo khuoah sipaihai LALPA chu be dingin kum tin a hang fe hlak a. Chutaka chun Eli naupasalhai pahni, Hophni le Phinehas, LALPA thiempuhai chu an um a.
Chun, Elkana inthâwi ni a hung tlung chun a nuhmei Peninna le a naupasalhai le a naunuhai po po chu chanvo a siempêk a.
Hanna ta ding ruok chun chan hni a siempêk a, Hanna chu a hmangai êm êm sih a; nisienla- khawm, LALPAIN a sul a sukping- pêk a.
Chun, LALPAIN a sul a suk- pingpêk leiin a lungngaina chu chawktho tumin a khingpui chun a lo thaw rawp hlak a.
Chuong anga kum tin a lo thaw hlak leiin, LALPA ina a hang fe zâtin a lungngaina chu amanu chun a lo chawktho hlak a. Chuleiin, Hanna chu a ṭap a ṭap a, bu khawm a fâk nawh a.

Chun, a pasal Elkana chun a kuomah, “Hanna, ieng dinga i ṭap am? Ieng dinga bu i fâk naw am a na? Ieng dinga i lungril i suknat am? Nau- pasal sâwm nêk khawmin i ta dingin ka ṭha lem a ni naw am a nih?” a ta.
Chun, Silo khuoa bu an fâk a an dâwn zo chun Hanna chu a tho a. Thiempu Eli chu LALPA biek in kawtkhâr ban bula a ṭhungnaa chun a ṭhung a.
Chun, Hanna chu a lungril a lunginzîng êm êm el a, LALPA kuomah a ṭawngṭai a, lungsetakin a ṭap a.

Chun, thu a tiem a, “Aw sipaihai LALPA, i suoknu tlâwmzie hi i hriet tak meu a, i mi hriet zing a, i suoknu hi i mi theinghil nawh a, i suoknu hi naupasal i pêk chun a dam sûng po chu LALPA pe ve thung ka ta, a lu khawm vâw hrim hrim ni naw ni,” a ta.
Chun, LALPA hmaa a ṭawngṭai zing lai chun Eli chun a hmûr châng chu a lo inchik a.
Hanna chun a lungrilin a hril a, a hmûr chu a châng a, a râwl chu hriet a ni nawh a; chuleiin, Eli chun zu ân rui niin a ring a.
Chuongchun, Eli chun a kuomah, “Ieng chen am inrui zinga i um ding a na? I uoin chu sie hmang raw khai,” a ta.
Hanna chun a dawn a, “Ni lo, ka lalpa, nuhmei lungril lungngai tâwp- khâwk ka na; uoin khawm, zupui khawm ka dâwn dêr nawh a, LALPA hmaa chun ka lungril ka phawr lem a nih.
I suoknu hi Belial naunuah inbûk naw raw khai; ka lungrila sip liem ka lungninawna le ka lung- ngaina ka hril a ni hi,” a ta.
Eli chun, “Lungmuongtakin fe raw khai, Israelhai Pathien chun i thil hni chu pe raw se che,” a tih a, a dawn a.
Ama chun, “I siehlawnu hi i mittlung ni raw se,” a ta. Chuong- chun, nuhmei chu a fe tah a, bu dâm a fâk a, lungngai hmêl a put ta nawh a.
Chun, zingkâr an tho a, LALPA chu an biek a, an fe tah a, Rama khuoa an in chu an tlung nâwk tah a; chun, Elkana chun a nuhmei Hanna chu a pâwl a, chun, LALPAIN ama chu a hriet zing a.
Chuongchun, Hanna chun nau a vawn a; a hun a hung tlung chun naupasal a nei a, “LALPA ka ihni a nih,” tiin a hminga chun Samuel a sak a.
Chun, Elkana le a sûnghai po po chu LALPA kuoma an kum tin inthâwina inhlân ding le an thutiem hlen dingin an hang feh a.

Hanna ruok chu a hang fe ve nawh a; a pasal kuoma chun, “Kei chu naute hin nêne nêk a bân hmakhat chu hang fe ve naw ning ah; chu pha ruok chun LALPA hmaha ân lang theina dingin ṭhuoi ka ta, chutaka chun um zing el tâng a tih,” a ta.

A pasal Elkana chun a kuomah, “Ṭha âwma i ti ang phawt chun thaw el rawh; a nêne nêk în bântir chenin um rawh, amiruokchu, LALPA chun a thu chu sukdet ngei raw se,” a ta. Chuongchun, a nêne nêk bân hma- khat chun nuhmei chu a um tah a, a naupa chu a enkawl a.
Chun, nêne nêk ân bântir phing chun beiphit epha khat le uoin saidawiûm khat chawiin sebâwng pathum leh a hang ṭhuoi a, Silo khuoa LALPA ina chun a fepui a; naupang chu a la naupang hleh a.
Chun, bâwngchal chu an that a, naupang chu Eli kuoma chun an ṭhuoi a.
Chun, ama chun, “Aw ka lalpa, i hringna sâlin ka hril a, kei chu aw lalpa, hi hmuna i kâwla ngîr a, LALPA kuoma ṭawngṭaitu nuhmei ka ni ngei a.
Hi naupang hni hin ka ṭawngṭai a na, chun, LALPA chun ka hni chu a mi pêk tah a.
Chuleiin, kei khawma LALPA kuomah kân hlân a nih; a dam sûng poa LALPA ta dinga inhlân a nih,” a ta. Chun, chutaka chun LALPA chu a biek a.
